name: Driver Buddy Revolutions
description: Single-file IDA Pro plugin for rapid Windows kernel driver research. Identifies IOCTL handlers, device names, pool tags, risky memory usage, IRQL issues, taint paths to dangerous sinks, and more. Generates HTML/JSON reports, a C IOCTL harness, and an in-IDA findings browser.
author: Juan Sacco
notes: Best results on Windows kernel drivers (.sys).
Writes artifacts (IOCTL list, pool tags, HTML report, JSON export, PoC stub) to the current working directory.
